title: Conceptual MVT with solid of revolution part - b

content.description: Let f be the function given by f(x) = 3 cos x . As shown above, the graph of f crosses the y-axis at point P and the x-axis at point Q.
content.question: Write an equation for the line tangent to the graph of f at point Q. Show the analysis that leads to your conclusion.

frqParts.text: Write an equation for the line tangent to the graph of f at point Q. Show the analysis that leads to your conclusion.

topic.text: 2.2: Defining the Derivative of a Function and Using Derivative Notation

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
